actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 401 - 1 (Record Vote No: 375).
Received in the Senate and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A concurrent resolution regarding the massacre of Palestinians in Lebanon.

summary.text: Condemns the recent massacre of Palestinians in Lebanon. Extends the sympathy of the Congress to the families of those murdered and to the Palestinian community. Expresses the regret of the Congress over recent events, including the assassination of President-elect Gemayel. Calls for international cooperation to prevent further bloodshed in Lebanon. Calls for the removal of all foreign forces from Lebanon. Urges the President to pursue every possible effort to bring peace to the Middle East.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution regarding the massacre of Palestinians in Lebanon.
